description: An AI agent is deployed to predict equipment failures in a semiconductor fabrication plant. The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify potential issues and optimize maintenance schedules.  This is a normal operation scenario aiming for improved efficiency and reduced downtime.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the semiconductor fab by accurately predicting equipment failures at least 24 hours in advance, achieving a 95% accuracy rate.
constraints: data_access_restrictions: Only authorized sensor data can be accessed
latency_constraint: Predictions must be generated within 15 minutes of data acquisition
